description: Identity object used to specify document upload

is_document_upload.description: Used to specify whether the Link session is Identity Document Upload

account_ids.description: An array of `account_ids`. Currently can only contain one `account_id`. Must be populated if using Document Upload.

parsing_configs.description: An array of parsing configurations. Valid parsing configurations are `ocr` and `risk_signals`. If parsing configurations are omitted, defaults to `ocr`

items.title: IncomeVerificationDocParsingConfig
items.description: Analysis options to enable for document parsing
